data.actual_result: You stay in Games tab even when its not showing on the bar
data.expected_result: You should be on Friends tab
data.short_description: [REPOSTED FROM LINUX] If you are in games tab and you disable it, after getting off settings the games tab remains open
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to games tab - On games tab, go to user settings and disable games tab - Exit settings
